Title: Koukaku Kidoutai: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society 3D
Description: ["Kenji Kamiyama and Production I.G's Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex: Solid State Society movie will be converted into stereoscopic 3D. Kamiyama himself is overseeing the conversion, and I.G will also add a newly animated opening sequence."]
Related: ['Adaptation: Dragon Ball', 'Parent story: Dragon Ball Z']
